name: PixelMaker
overview: PixelMaker is a drawing program designed specifically for making pixel art! Using easy-to-use tools on your Wii U GamePad, you can design images as simple or as complex as you like. Experiment, create characters and scenes based on your favorite classic video games, or draw something straight out of your own imagination. Finally, share your pixel art creations with your friends on Miiverse!
